verbs.description: [ARG1: Global stock markets] [V: fell] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: after U.S. President Donald Trump escalated a dispute with Beijing over technology policy by threatening a tariff hike on an additional $ 200 billion of Chinese goods] .

Global stock markets fell Tuesday after [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: escalated] [ARG1: a dispute with Beijing over technology policy] [ARGM-MNR: by threatening a tariff hike on an additional $ 200 billion of Chinese goods] .

Global stock markets fell Tuesday after [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] escalated a dispute with Beijing over technology policy by [V: threatening] [ARG2: a tariff hike on an additional $ 200 billion of Chinese goods] .
